body_html: We need to use the standard unittest.TestCase framework, not your TensorFlowTestCase framework, so self.test_session does not exist. Is there any way to disable this optimization in a regular tensorflow session - ie. with tf.Session()?

body: We need to use the standard unittest.TestCase framework, not your TensorFlowTestCase framework, so self.test_session does not exist. Is there any way to disable this optimization in a regular tensorflow session - ie. with tf.Session()?
